mapper.select: select * from real_estate_sale order by listing_number desc
select * from real_estate_info order by listing_number desc
select * from publication_info order by listing_number desc
select * from tenant_info order by listing_number desc
select * from sold_building order by listing_number desc

select listing_number, building_name, address, supply_area, floors, usage, land_area, floor_area, coverage_ratio, floor_area_ratio, to_char(completion_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as completion_date, image1, image2, image3, latitude, longitude from real_estate_info where listing_number = #{LN}

select listing_number, subject, type, publisher, volume, issue_price, total_amount, to_char(start_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as start_date, to_char(expiration_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as expiration_date, to_char(first_dividend_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as first_dividend_date, dividend_cycle, dividend from publication_info where listing_number = #{LN}
select listing_number, lessee, sector, to_char(contract_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as contract_date, to_char(expiration_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as expiration_date from tenant_info where listing_number = #{LN}
mapper.insert: insert into real_estate_sale(state, price, reasonable_price) values ('청약', 5000, 5000)

insert into real_estate_info(listing_number, building_name, address, SUPPLY_AREA, floors, usage, land_area, floor_area, coverage_ratio, floor_area_ratio, completion_date, latitude, longitude, image1, image2, image3) values (#{listingNumber}, #{buildingName}, #{address}, #{supplyArea}, #{floors}, #{usage}, #{landArea}, #{floorArea}, #{coverageRatio}, #{floorAreaRatio}, #{completionDate}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3})

insert into publication_info(LISTING_NUMBER, SUBJECT, TYPE, PUBLISHER, VOLUME, ISSUE_PRICE, TOTAL_AMOUNT, START_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, FIRST_DIVIDEND_DATE, DIVIDEND_CYCLE, DIVIDEND) values (#{listingNumber}, #{subject}, #{type}, #{publisher}, #{volume}, #{issuePrice}, #{totalAmount}, #{startDate}, #{expirationDate}, #{firstDividendDate}, #{dividendCycle}, #{dividend})

insert into tenant_info(LISTING_NUMBER, LESSEE, SECTOR, CONTRACT_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE) values (#{listingNumber}, #{lessee}, #{sector}, to_date(#{contractDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{expirationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

insert into sold_building(listing_number, amount, start_date, expiration_date, dividend) values (#{listingNumber}, #{amount}, to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{expirationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{dividend})
mapper.select: select REI.LISTING_NUMBER as listingNumber, REI.IMAGE1 as image1, REI.IMAGE2 as image2, REI.IMAGE3 as image3, REI.BUILDING_NAME as buildingName, res.INTRODUCTION as introduction from real_estate_sale res INNER JOIN real_estate_info rei ON res.listing_number = rei.LISTING_NUMBER where state = '청약'

select REI.LISTING_NUMBER as listingNumber, REI.IMAGE1 as image1, REI.IMAGE2 as image2, REI.IMAGE3 as image3, REI.BUILDING_NAME as buildingName, res.EVALUATION as evaluation from real_estate_sale res INNER JOIN real_estate_info rei ON res.listing_number = rei.LISTING_NUMBER where state = '거래'

select * from (select res.LISTING_NUMBER as listingNumber, evaluation, reasonable_price as reasonablePrice, introduction, price, state, building_name as buildingName, image1 from REAL_ESTATE_SALE res inner join REAL_ESTATE_INFO rei on res.listing_number = rei.listing_number) where state = '거래'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT RES.LISTING_NUMBER AS LISTINGNUMBER, STATE, BUILDING_NAME AS BUILDINGNAME, IMAGE1, to_char(SB.SOLD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SOLDDATE, SB.AMOUNT AS AMOUNT, SB.DIVIDEND AS DIVIDEND, PI.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS publicationAmount FROM REAL_ESTATE_SALE RES INNER JOIN REAL_ESTATE_INFO REI ON RES.LISTING_NUMBER = REI.LISTING_NUMBER INNER JOIN SOLD_BUILDING SB ON RES.LISTING_NUMBER = SB.LISTING_NUMBER INNER JOIN PUBLICATION_INFO PI ON RES.LISTING_NUMBER = PI.LISTING_NUMBER) WHERE STATE = '매각'
